meanings.definition: A legendary sea monster of large size said to dwell off the coasts of Norway and Greenland.
meanings.sent1: Legends tell of a kraken lurking in the deep waters.
meanings.sent2: The sailors feared encountering a kraken during their voyage.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the thought of a kraken hiding under their beds.
meanings.sent4: The stormy waves seemed like the tentacles of a kraken reaching out.
meanings.sent5: The kraken's presence in the story made it thrilling and mysterious.

meanings.sent1: In the movie, a kraken terrorized the city with its immense size.
meanings.sent2: The forest was home to many mythical creatures, including a kraken.
meanings.sent3: The giant cake at the party was described as a kraken of sweetness.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak looked like the head of a kraken rising from the ground.
meanings.sent5: The kraken in the legend was depicted as a colossal beast of the sea.
